Title: Relates to rates of fare on the metropolitan transportation authority
Summary: Relates to fare rates on the metropolitan transportation authority; directs the metropolitan transportation authority to establish and implement a no fare program for uniformed correction officers employed by the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to rates of fare on the metropolitan transportation authority
